question: 別の
sourceAnswer: Separate, Different, Another, Separate Thing, Different Thing, Another Thing
sourceMnemonic: The <ja>の</ja> is there to indicate that it is the difference of something. For example this is like saying "the <vocabulary>separate</vocabulary> ______" or "the <vocabulary>different</vocabulary> _____" or "<vocabulary>another</vocabulary> ______". <ja>別</ja> by itself just means separate, different, or another.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned. Move on to a <ja>別の漢字</ja>, mmk?
